id.description: Unique identifier for Directory. Starts with `dir_`.
id.title: Directory ID

name.title: Directory name
name.description: Name to set for the directory.

parent_id.title: Parent directory ID
parent_id.description: ID of the parent directory. Specify this to move directories. Starts with `dir_`.

path.title: Directory path
path.description: Path to move the directory to, relative to the root directory. Specify this to move directories. Includes name, e.g. `path/to/directory`.
